name: Vandana Sharma
about: SAP Employee central service center & CPI being the core skillsets, I've been a part of multiple implementation projects. Created ecsc workflows and routing rules in c4c, AskHR, replication through standard CPI package from SF to c4c. Adept at custom interfaces translating complex requirements by understanding clients' requirements in kick off calls, setting up the expectations and timely delivery. Using,BTP, CPI. Created custom packages on CPI with embedded groovy, javascript, xslt scripting keeping in view the recommended security methodologies in place viz. standard/ certificate authentication for third party applications.
